text: on May 23rd 1967 a similar mystery
electrical surge jammed American
ballistic missile early warning sites in
places as far away as Alaska and UK the
Americans realize that their radar
systems their early warnings their
defense against nuclear attack are all
jammed US Air Force commanders
immediately scrambled fleets of
long-range nuclear bombers the obvious
implication is that you're under attack
and the immediate response to prepare
for a retaliatory strike just before the
military launched the aircraft
astronomers at NORAD inform Air Force
commanders that they think solar flares
not the Soviets are causing the radar
problems as it turns out what was
jamming America's radars and what nearly
brought the world to the brink of
nuclear war was a huge omission from the
biggest nuclear reactor of all the Sun
